mapper.select: select i.id, i.code, i.`status`, i.current_overload, i.humidity_overload, i.current_threshold, i.light_info, i.latitude, i.lightness_overload, i.humidity_threshold, i.lightness_threshold, i.longitude, i.strategy_id, i.temperature_overload, i.temperature_threshold, i.voltage_overload, i.voltage_threshold from sys_light_info as i where i.exist = 1

select i.id, i.code, i.`status`, i.current_overload, i.humidity_overload, i.current_threshold, i.light_info, i.latitude, i.lightness_overload, i.humidity_threshold, i.lightness_threshold, i.longitude, i.strategy_id, i.temperature_overload, i.temperature_threshold, i.voltage_overload, i.voltage_threshold from sys_light_info as i left join sys_region as r on r.common_region_id = i.street_id where r.common_region_id like CONCAT(#{cityId}, '%') and r.region_desc = '街道' and i.exist = 1

select i.id, i.code, i.`status`, i.current_overload, i.humidity_overload, i.current_threshold, i.light_info, i.latitude, i.lightness_overload, i.humidity_threshold, i.lightness_threshold, i.longitude, i.strategy_id, i.temperature_overload, i.temperature_threshold, i.voltage_overload, i.voltage_threshold from sys_light_info as i left join sys_region as r on r.common_region_id = i.street_id where r.up_region_id = #{areaId}

select i.id, i.code, i.`status`, i.current_overload, i.humidity_overload, i.current_threshold, i.light_info, i.latitude, i.lightness_overload, i.humidity_threshold, i.lightness_threshold, i.longitude, i.strategy_id, i.temperature_overload, i.temperature_threshold, i.voltage_overload, i.voltage_threshold from sys_light_info as i where i.street_id = #{streetId} and i.exist = 1

select i.id, i.code, i.`status`, i.current_overload, i.humidity_overload, i.current_threshold, i.light_info, i.latitude, i.lightness_overload, i.humidity_threshold, i.lightness_threshold, i.longitude, i.strategy_id, i.temperature_overload, i.temperature_threshold, i.voltage_overload, i.voltage_threshold from sys_light_info as i where i.group_id = #{groupId} and i.exist = 1

select i.id, i.code, i.`status`, i.current_overload, i.humidity_overload, i.current_threshold, i.light_info, i.latitude, i.lightness_overload, i.humidity_threshold, i.lightness_threshold, i.longitude, i.strategy_id, i.temperature_overload, i.temperature_threshold, i.voltage_overload, i.voltage_threshold from sys_light_info as i where i.user_id = #{userId} and i.exist = 1

select i.id, i.code, i.`status`, i.current_overload, i.humidity_overload, i.current_threshold, i.light_info, i.latitude, i.lightness_overload, i.humidity_threshold, i.lightness_threshold, i.longitude, i.strategy_id, i.temperature_overload, i.temperature_threshold, i.voltage_overload, i.voltage_threshold from sys_light_info as i where i.status = #{status} and i.exist = 1
